dcterms:creator: D. de Vleeschauwer
J. Baranda
dcterms:description: A real-world vehicular trace dataset used for evaluating the performance of Deep Reinforcement Learning in scaling Edge computing resources for vehicular-to-network communications.
dcterms:title: Real-world vehicular trace dataset

dcterms:creator: D. de Vleeschauwer
J. Baranda
dcterms:description: Road traffic traces collected from the streets of Turin, utilized for dynamically scaling Edge computing resources in vehicular applications.
dcterms:title: Road traffic traces from Turin

dcterms:creator: D. de Vleeschauwer
J. Baranda
dcterms:description: Traffic trace data from Corso Orbassano road in Turin, spanning from January 2020 to October 2020, used for evaluating scaling strategies in Edge computing for vehicular networks.
dcterms:title: Traffic trace from Corso Orbassano road in Turin
